title: Hostiles
synopsis: After a long career battling the Cheyenne, a U.S. Army captain is ordered to safely escort the tribe's most influential chief to his Montana homeland.

title: Demetri Martin: The Overthinker
synopsis: With his signature one-liners and drawings, Demetri Martin muses on doughnut holes, dogs, sports bars, the alphabet's most aggressive letters and more.

title: Zion
synopsis: Born without legs and stuck in foster care for years, teen Zion Clark finds his calling when he pursues competitive wrestling. A documentary short.

title: Toilet: Ek Prem Katha
synopsis: On her first day of marriage, a woman leaves her husband upon learning his home lacks a toilet, sparking a quixotic quest to acquire modern sanitation.

title: A Leaf of Faith
synopsis: This documentary takes a deep dive into the benefits, dangers and lingering questions around Kratom leaf as an alternative to opioid painkillers.

title: Surat Dari Praha
synopsis: Hoping to fulfill her deceased mother's final wish, a young woman travels to Prague to deliver an old letter to a mysterious man.

title: Private Life
synopsis: Struggling to conceive, a couple in their 40s are almost out of options -- until a sliver of hope arrives in the form of their visiting step-niece.

title: Pulang
synopsis: Thom tells her grandson about his grandfather, a sailor who left 61 years ago to seek his fortune, and asks him to find out what happened to her spouse.

title: No One Killed Jessica
synopsis: This thriller tells the true story of model Jessica Lall -- who was shot dead in a restaurant -- and the campaign to bring her killer to justice.

title: The Seven Deadly Sins the Movie: Prisoners of the Sky
synopsis: The Seven Deadly Sins aid the Sky People against a powerful group of demons hellbent on resurrecting a demonic beast sealed over 3,000 years ago.

title: Halkaa
synopsis: Up against a corrupt government official and crushing poverty, a young boy in the Delhi slums attempts to raise funds to build himself his own toilet.

title: The Cakemaker
synopsis: When a German baker travels to Jerusalem in search of his dead male lover’s family, his growing involvement with them may expose his truth.

title: Surga Yang Tak Dirindukan 2
synopsis: In this sequel to the award-winning 2015 film, Pras, Arini and Meirose face new challenges that could change the dynamic of their unique love triangle.

title: Black Mirror: Bandersnatch
synopsis: In 1984, a young programmer begins to question reality as he adapts a dark fantasy novel into a video game. A mind-bending tale with multiple endings.

title: FYRE: The Greatest Party That Never Happened
synopsis: The Fyre Festival was billed as a luxury music experience on a posh private island, but it failed spectacularly in the hands of a cocky entrepreneur.

title: Paddleton
synopsis: After he's diagnosed with terminal cancer, middle-aged Michael asks his neighbor friend Andy to help him end his life before the disease does.

title: Ray Romano: Right Here, Around the Corner
synopsis: Ray Romano cut his stand-up teeth at the Comedy Cellar in New York. Now, in his first comedy special in 23 years, he returns to where it all began.

title: ReMastered: The Two Killings of Sam Cooke
synopsis: While Sam Cooke rose to stardom as a soul singer, his outspoken views on civil rights drew attention that may have contributed to his death at age 33.

title: She's Dating the Gangster
synopsis: To make another woman jealous, a campus heartthrob asks a fellow student to be his pretend girlfriend, but fate has other plans for the fake couple.

title: GoldenEye
synopsis: Pierce Brosnan takes his first turn as debonair secret agent James Bond, who investigates the destruction of a Russian satellite weapons base.

title: Everything About Her
synopsis: A hard-driving real estate tycoon who becomes ill with cancer hires a medical caretaker who helps her begin to mend fences with her estranged son.

title: The Death of Stalin
synopsis: The death of Russian dictator Joseph Stalin throws the Soviet Union into comic chaos as his ambitious but addled ministers maneuver to succeed him.

title: Crazy Beautiful You
synopsis: A rebellious daughter accompanies her mother on a medical mission where she falls for the handsome politician's son assigned to be her chaperone.

title: A Fortunate Man
synopsis: A gifted engineer flees his austere roots to pursue wealth and success among Copenhagen's elite, but the pride propelling him threatens to be his ruin.

title: Jhankaar Beats
synopsis: Juggling personal predicaments and workplace woes, three buddies and bandmates practice for their ultimate dream: winning a coveted music competition.

title: The Accountant of Auschwitz
synopsis: Decades after WWII, a former SS officer stands trial in his native Germany after being charged for his complicity in the murder of Jews at Auschwitz.

title: Beats
synopsis: On Chicago's South Side, hip-hop prodigy August Monroe navigates crippling anxiety and new creative frontiers with the help of an unlikely mentor.

title: Screwball
synopsis: A steroid peddler explains how he went from an unlicensed anti-aging expert to the point man for the biggest scandal in baseball history.

title: 300 Miles to Heaven
synopsis: Hoping to help their dissident parents, two brothers sneak out of Poland and land as refugees in Denmark, where they are prevented from returning home.

title: Escape from the 'Liberty' Cinema
synopsis: Artistic rebellion ignites at the movies when film characters suddenly speak freely to the audience, prompting a surly censor to combat the uprising.

title: Wish Man
synopsis: After surviving a life-threatening accident, a troubled cop finds new purpose when he bonds with a terminally ill little boy. Based on a true story.

title: Don
synopsis: A ruthless crime boss and drug lord is nabbed and held captive by the authorities, who send his naïve look-alike to infiltrate the man's gang.

title: Satte Pe Satta
synopsis: The eldest of seven brothers who run a family farm together marries a pretty nurse, inspiring his country-bumpkin siblings to follow his example.

title: Whisky
synopsis: To impress family, a factory owner pretends to be married to one of his employees, and soon, the 'couple' finds their lives radically altered.

title: Indian Horse
synopsis: Stripped of his heritage at a residential school, an indigenous student finds refuge on the rink when he discovers a passion for hockey.
In a postapocalyptic world, rag-doll robots hide in fear from dangerous machines out to exterminate them, until a brave newcomer joins the group.

title: Mansfield Park
synopsis: A poor heroine is sent to live with wealthy relatives in 1800s England, where her wit and writing talent find the room, and circumstance, to grow.

title: Michael Che Matters
synopsis: 'SNL' star Michael Che takes on hot-button topics like inequality, homophobia and gentrification in this stand-up set filmed live in Brooklyn.

title: BoJack Horseman Christmas Special: Sabrina's Christmas Wish
synopsis: It's Christmas, and BoJack wants nothing to do with it. Then Todd shows up with a giant candy cane and an old 'Horsin' Around' Christmas episode.

title: Locke
synopsis: Over the space of 90 minutes, Ivan Locke's life spins out of control via a series of phone calls made while he drives down the highway to London.

title: Print the Legend
synopsis: This award-winning, original documentary chronicles the race for market leadership in 3D printing, the next wave of technological evolution.

title: Russell Peters: Notorious
synopsis: Global comedy star Russell Peters leaves no ethnic or cultural stereotype unsatirized in this outrageous standup appearance in Sydney, Australia.

title: Tinker, Tailor, Soldier, Spy
synopsis: This gripping thriller about Cold War espionage follows an English spy as he returns to MI-6 under suspicion that he's become a Soviet operative.

title: Shrek the Musical
synopsis: The greatest fairy tale never told comes to life in this colorful, song-filled, Tony Award-winning Broadway production based on the hit movie.

title: The Princess and the Frog
synopsis: In New Orleans during the Jazz Age, a beautiful girl named Tiana has a fateful encounter with frog prince who desperately wants to be human again.

title: The Ring
synopsis: A reporter watches a video that supposedly sets in motion the viewer's death in seven days. Can she unravel the mystery before her own time is up?

title: ​Mayurakshi
synopsis: When a middle-aged divorcee returns to Kolkata to visit his ailing father, long-buried memories resurface, bringing new discoveries with them.

title: Tremors
synopsis: After a seismologist gets unusual readings on her equipment, handymen discover 30-foot-long carnivorous worms that suck their prey underground.

title: Jeff Dunham: Minding the Monsters
synopsis: Jeff Dunham returns with a haunted house full of his hysterical entourage, and each character stars in its own horror movie trailer.

title: The One I Love
synopsis: Confronted with the potential end of their marriage, Ethan and Sophie take off for a weekend together, hoping to negotiate their future.

title: Don 2
synopsis: With Asia under his complete control, criminal mastermind Don turns to Europe, battling the mob bosses of each nation along the way.

title: Blue Ruin
synopsis: Bad news from the past unhinges vagabond Dwight Evans, sending him on a mission of bloody retribution that takes him to his childhood hometown.

title: Snowpiercer
synopsis: The Earth's remaining inhabitants are confined to a single train circling the globe as revolution brews among the class-divided cars.

title: Lavell Crawford: Can a Brother Get Some Love?
synopsis: 'Last Comic Standing' runner-up Lavell Crawford lords over a hometown crowd at St. Louis's Orpheum Theatre, raking in the love -- and the laughs.

title: The Unknown Known
synopsis: Donald Rumsfeld reviews his long political career, from his time in Congress to serving as secretary of defense under Gerald Ford and George W. Bush.

title: Raajneeti
synopsis: When the American-educated scion of a powerful Indian family returns to the subcontinent, his first taste of power starts him down a corrupt path.

title: Maria Bamford: The Special Special Special
synopsis: Spend an evening with gleeful, oh-so-awkward Maria Bamford via her cozy, shot-at-home comedy special, which has a two-person audience: her parents.

title: Arthur Christmas
synopsis: At Santa Claus's super-secret toy-making facility, Mr. Claus entrusts his son, Arthur, to carry out an ultra-important Christmas mission.

title: Once Again
synopsis: After a chance phone call leads to daily conversations, a widowed restaurant owner and a lonely film actor plan to finally meet in person.

title: Haani
synopsis: When a man discovers that he can communicate with his grandfather's spirit, it leads to two love stories intertwining 50 years apart.

title: The Spectacular Now
synopsis: Classmates Aimee and Sutter form an unlikely friendship, and after helping Aimee raise her social confidence, Sutter begins falling for his creation.

title: Shutter
synopsis: After killing a young girl in a hit-and-run accident, a couple is haunted by more than just the memory of their deadly choice.

title: Aashayein
synopsis: When he learns he has terminal cancer, a cynical gambler and chronic smoker ditches his fiancée, snubs doctors and checks into a nursing home to die.

title: Catfish
synopsis: A young photographer becomes involved with a gifted 8-year-old artist's family -- until he realizes something's not quite right.

title: Solo
synopsis: Four disparate lives -- a gangster, a student, a veterinarian and a soldier -- are evocatively connected to elements of earth, fire, wind and water.

title: Colin Quinn: Unconstitutional
synopsis: New York comedian Colin Quinn writes and stars in this live one-man stage show that dissects and deconstructs U.S. constitutional history.

title: Shootout at Lokhandwala
synopsis: Based on a true story, this action film follows an incident that stunned a nation in the early 1990s. In Mumbai, India, the notorious gangster Maya holds off veteran cop Khan and a force of more than 200 policemen in a six-hour bloody gunfi...

title: The Five Venoms
synopsis: A dying kung fu master sends his last student to track down five former pupils in order to learn which one of them has become evil.

title: Kajaki: The True Story
synopsis: On patrol in Afghanistan, a British paratrooper unit unwittingly ventures into a dry riverbed that turns out to be littered with land mines.

title: Jeff Dunham: All Over the Map
synopsis: America's most beloved ventriloquist hits the road, bringing along all of his most popular pals, including Achmed, Peanut and Walter.

title: LSD: Love, Sex Aur Dhokha
synopsis: This provocative drama examines how the voyeuristic nature of modern society affects three unusual couples in Northern India.

title: My Beautiful Broken Brain
synopsis: After suffering a stroke at age 34, a woman documents her struggles, setbacks and eventual breakthrough as she relearns to speak, read and write.

title: Kung Fu Panda: Secrets of the Scroll
synopsis: When a twist of fate brings five unlikely animals together, they find that combining their unique kung fu styles as a team makes the perfect weapon!

title: Look Who's Back
synopsis: When Adolf Hitler reawakens at the site of his former bunker 70 years later, he's mistaken for a brilliant comedian and becomes a media phenomenon.

title: Ip Man 3
synopsis: Martial arts master Ip springs into action when his son's school is threatened by a shady American, then defends his status as wing chun champion.

title: Kahlil Gibran's The Prophet
synopsis: A troubled young girl and her mother find solace on a journey with a subversive poet whose words captivate their hearts and imaginations.

title: Holy Hell
synopsis: An ex-member charts his path from idealism to disenchantment in a California cult when alarming revelations about the group's leader come to light.

title: The Interview
synopsis: Eddie Fleming is grilled relentlessly about an offense and quickly finds himself trapped in a nightmare -- but is it of his own making?

title: Seoul Searching
synopsis: Teens of Korean descent who were born and raised in other countries travel to Seoul to learn about their cultural heritage at a summer camp in 1986.

title: Rustom
synopsis: A decorated naval officer kills his wife's lover, leading to a sensational trial and a national obsession over passion versus premeditated murder.

title: We Are Young. We Are Strong.
synopsis: In 1992, three radically different residents of Rostock, Germany, become entangled in a violent xenophobic riot that rocks the beleaguered city.

title: Gantz:O
synopsis: Teams of recently deceased people who've been revived and given high-tech weapons must cooperate to defeat an army of monsters in Tokyo and Osaka.

title: The Young Offenders
synopsis: Never ones to think things through, two Irish teens steal bicycles and set off to the coast to find a bale of cocaine from a smuggler’s capsized ship.

title: Notes on Blindness
synopsis: Based on the audio diaries of academic and theologian John Hull, this film offers an impressionistic re-creation of his slow descent into blindness.

title: Naruto Shippuden: The Movie: The Lost Tower
synopsis: When Naruto is sent to recover a missing nin, the rogue manages to send him 20 years into the past, where he unites with his father to battle evil.

title: Jo Koy: Live from Seattle
synopsis: Between raising a teenage boy and growing up with a Filipino mother, stand-up comic Jo Koy has been through a lot. He's here to tell you all about it.

title: Why We Fight: The Battle of Russia
synopsis: This installment of Frank Capra's acclaimed documentary series highlights the need for a Russo-American alliance to defeat the Nazis.

title: National Bird
synopsis: Three former military operatives offer disturbing, firsthand accounts of the deadly impact that U.S. drone warfare has had on civilians overseas.

title: Gabbar Is Back
synopsis: After a vengeful college professor targets corruption in the government, he adopts the name 'Gabbar' and becomes a hero to a weary public.

title: Joshua: Teenager vs. Superpower
synopsis: Mobilized by teenage activist Joshua Wong, young citizens of Hong Kong take to the streets in a bid to preserve their history of autonomy from China.

title: Kaabil
synopsis: The happy life of a young blind couple is shattered when the wife is raped and corrupt police won't help, sending the husband on a quest for revenge.

title: Professor
synopsis: A college grad in need of money must disguise himself as an old man to tutor two young women who are under the watchful eye of their strict aunt.

title: Handsome Devil
synopsis: A self-described outsider is sent to a rugby-obsessed boarding school, where he forms an unexpected bond with the star player.

title: The Danish Girl
synopsis: In 1920s Denmark, married artists embark on a journey of unconditional love when the husband announces his intentions to live life as a woman.

title: Unacknowledged
synopsis: Noted UFO expert Dr. Steven Greer interviews witnesses and presents classified documents concerning the existence of extraterrestrials.

title: Janaan
synopsis: After 11 years in Canada, young Meena returns to her native Pakistan for a family wedding and becomes romantically entangled with an adopted cousin.

title: Restless Creature: Wendy Whelan
synopsis: After 30 years with the New York City Ballet, celebrated dancer Wendy Whelan redefines herself as an artist in a new stage of life.

title: I Am Bolt
synopsis: Mixing archival footage with present-day interviews, Olympic champion and global icon Usain Bolt opens up about his athletic legacy.

title: Steel Rain
synopsis: Amid a coup, a North Korean agent escapes south with the country's injured leader in an attempt to keep him alive and prevent a Korean war.

title: The Art of Loving
synopsis: During Communist rule, a Polish gynecologist and sexologist defies taboo and fights to publish her groundbreaking book on love and sex.
